name: New Beat
description: Emerged in the mid-1980s in Belgium; characterized by dark basslines, hard-hitting grooves and a slow tempo.

children.name: Hard Beat
children.description: Short-lived, harder, harsh form of New Beat with Industrial, Acid House and EBM-influenced arrangement.
